quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: I'm not superstitious, but I am a little stitious.
author: Michael Scott

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
author: Mae West

quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
author: Aristotle

quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.
author: Mark Twain

quote: A room without books is like a body without a soul.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

quote: The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
author: Plato

quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
author: Robert Frost

quote: You must do the things you think you cannot do.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
author: Norman Vaughan

quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one’s courage.
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door.
author: Milton Berle

quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Don’t wait. The time will never be just right.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: You can’t use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
author: George Addair

quote: Opportunities don’t happen, you create them.
author: Chris Grosser

quote: Great things never come from comfort zones.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.
author: John D. Rockefeller Jr.

quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: Quality means doing it right when no one is looking.
author: Henry Ford

quote: If you’re going through hell, keep going.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
author: Og Mandino

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right—for you’ll be criticized anyway.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: A champion is defined not by their wins but by how they can recover when they fall.
author: Serena Williams

quote: You can’t cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Don’t let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Courage is grace under pressure.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: A wise man can learn more from a foolish question than a fool can learn from a wise answer.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: You only fail when you stop trying.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Don’t wish it were easier. Wish you were better.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: Work hard in silence, let success make the noise.
author: Frank Ocean

quote: Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
author: David Goggins

quote: Make each day your masterpiece.
author: John Wooden

quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens.
author: Jimi Hendrix

quote: Don’t cry because it’s over, smile because it happened.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: The truth is rarely pure and never simple.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Do not go gentle into that good night.
author: Dylan Thomas

quote: Stay foolish to stay sane.
author: Maxime Lagacé

quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: He who opens a school door, closes a prison.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Love the life you live. Live the life you love.
author: Bob Marley

quote: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The man who has no imagination has no wings.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Peace begins with a smile.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
author: Socrates

quote: Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Silence is a source of great strength.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Man is what he believes.
author: Anton Chekhov

quote: The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.
author: Mary Pickford

quote: If you judge people, you have no time to love them.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
author: Aristotle

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Freedom lies in being bold.
author: Robert Frost

quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
author: Henry Ford

quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: The measure of who we are is what we do with what we have.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: You become what you believe.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: To handle yourself, use your head; to handle others, use your heart.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quote: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
author: Beverly Sills

quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: When you stop chasing the wrong things, you give the right things a chance to catch you.
author: Lolly Daskal

quote: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear, not absence of fear.
author: Mark Twain

quote: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The key to success is to start before you are ready.
author: Marie Forleo

quote: Nothing will work unless you do.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Hustle in silence and let your success make the noise.
author: Unknown
